attributes.action: Protect our children from physical & emotional bullying in every school
attributes.additional_details:
I call on the help of the Department of Education to rule out a law, policy or guideline to introduce a zero tolerance on bullying in our schools.

Anti Bullying Policies are not working, schools are hopeless, police can't deal with a physical attack as the schools don't want them involved, education authority advise all avenues to be exhausted before they will be intervene. Where is the end of the line?. All the red tape and steps taken by the parents, whilst, the victim continues to deal daily with the emotional and physical abuse.

I speak for thousands of parents in the UK, we need to re examine the policies surrounding bullying as a country

if the perpetrators knew of a punishment, it would deter.

Please help us to make a difference and protect our children to gain an education in a safer environment.

Bullying needs to have a zero tolerance, nothing more, nothing less.
